pr_title: Support using IP as connect host

timeline.message:
When hostname & bind.host not specified, local hostname is chosen as the connect host of the service, which may cause an UnknownHostException when the LOCAL service hostname cannot be resolved by a REMOTE client. This problem can be avoided by specifying alluxio.<service_name>.hostname or alluxio.<service_name>.bind.host using an IP address. But it is really troublesome when deploying lots of nodes.

Add alluxio.service.use.ip to support using ip as the connect host when enable.

timeline.author: apc999
